entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of drizzle. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of snow near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle after midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
